snippet: When the Long Island Rail Road had major delays on Monday morning, some commuters took to Twitter to commiserate, but others were left in the dark.
abstract: Editorial notes major delays on the Long Island Rail Road left many commuters with no option but to take to Twitter to commiserate, and those without smartphones were kept utterly in the dark.
lead_paragraph: When the Long Island Rail Road had major delays on Monday morning, some commuters took to Twitter to commiserate, but others were left in the dark.

headline.main: Riding and Raging on the Rail Road
headline.print_headline: Riding and Raging on the Rail Road
